body: The changes in this pull request add the `+sse` and `+shared` variants to the `cryptopp` package. I've verified the build correctness of the `@5.6.3~sse{+|~}shared` and `@7.0.0{+|~}sse{+|~}shared` variants with a `%gcc4.9.3 arch=linux-rhel7-broadwell` build configuration.
title: cryptopp : add 'sse' and 'shared' variants
